content: row slip_stitch into top chain of 1st stitch 36 fasten off and change colour note the pattern of single_crochet skip 2 6dc skip 2 is known as a shell fasten_off and change colour row 5 attach new colour chain 1 and single_crochet in the same stitch working on top of the 6 stitches of the shells from the last row place in order single_crochet single_crochet and half_double_crochet 2dc and 1tc 1tc and 2 double_crochet half_double_crochet and single_crochet single_crochet repeat this pattern for all six of the shells in the row ignoring the chain that joins shell bases slip_stitch into 1st stitch fasten_off and change colour row 6 attach new colour chain 1 and single_crochet in the same stitch work single_crochet around all stitches in the round slip_stitch into the first stitch and fasten_off repeat this pattern for all four coasters
